name: Caretaker Sacrifice
storyline:
The stars are going out. Nobody knows why. An elite military team are sent on a mission into the cosmos to discover the reason. Caretaker Sacrifice tells the story of the lone survivor of this mission who searches out what’s causing the stars to disappear and makes the ultimate sacrifice to stop it.

It is the end of everything. The stars went out long ago; everyone you knew and loved is dead. Now, alone in chill of the endless void, you have one last task - to battle through an ancient machine and decide the final fate of everything.
summary: Narrated by David Hewlett of Stargate, Caretaker Sacrifice is an epic sci-fi 6DOF adventure puzzle shooter game set in the far future. At the end of time, delve into the twisting innards of this hostile alien machine, through peril and adventure, to puzzle out and solve the ultimate mystery of what happened to the universe. Fulfill your final mission. In every sense, it’s a cerebral descent.
